name: ExecuteGraphqlBatchQueries
description:
Execute multiple GraphQL queries in a single request.

Executes multiple GraphQL queries sent in a single network request for efficiency. Ideal for performing batch queries in Weaviate.

parameters.name: graphql_queries_batch
parameters.description: An array of GraphQL query objects to execute in batch. Each object should include 'operationName', 'query', and optional 'variables'.

operationName.description: The name of the operation if multiple exist in the query.

value_schema.description: An array containing multiple GraphQL query objects to execute in batch.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the weaviate API.

parameters.description: An array containing multiple GraphQL query objects to execute in batch.
